text: Democratic Alignment (, Dimokratiki Parataxi) is a centrist political party in Cyprus. The party was created after disagreements with Democratic Party (DIKO) leader Nikolas Papadopoulos in regards to the approach the Greek Cypriot administration should take in regards to working to solve the Cyprus problem. ==Footnotes== Category:Political parties established in 2018 Category:Political parties in Cyprus
title: Democratic Alignment (Cyprus)
